TopicTitle: RCS fuel for version 0.6's vanilla scale?

Articles.Content:
I can't find RCS fuel, SAS, and components like that for 0.16's new realistic scale. Can anyone help me find them?

Edited August 24, 2012 by longbyte1

Hi longbyte1, do you mean 2 meter tanks for 0.16's new larger parts?

If I recall correctly, there are a number of packs with 2 meter RCS, NovaPunch is currently unavailable, but the White Monkey pack, Down Under pack and the Silisko Edition rocket pack all have 2 meter components

Edit:

Turns out the White Monkey parts are 1.5 meters, oh well I have added the link anyway, plus here is the Failcan.

All those threads are old and not every part will work, the pods especially, also don't post in those threads

Edited August 24, 2012 by sal_vager

Do you mean RCS tanks for the new, larger scale in 0.16?

There aren't any yet, nor are there any large-size ASAS or SAS. People are having to do weird and wonderful things like stacking a 3-man capsule on a decoupler and a thin stalk of RCS and ASAS and using lots of struts to make them take the weight!

EDIT: Ninja'ed!

Hi longbyte1, do you mean 2 meter tanks for 0.16's new larger parts?

If I recall correctly, there are a number of packs with 2 meter RCS, NovaPunch is currently unavailable, but the White Monkey pack, Down Under pack and the Silisko Edition rocket pack all have 2 meter components

Yes, that's what I meant, sorry.

Oh, so there aren't vanilla RCS parts on a 2 meter scale? Okay, so will there be vanilla 2-meter RCS soon?
